title: Water in a pool part - d

content.question: Find the rate at which the volume of water in the pool is increasing at time t=8 hours. How fast is the water level in the pool rising at t=8 hours? Indicate units of measure in both answers.

frqParts.text: Find the rate at which the volume of water in the pool is increasing at time t=8 hours. How fast is the water level in the pool rising at t=8 hours? Indicate units of measure in both answers.

skill.text: Skill 3.F: Explain the meaning of mathematical solutions in context.
